ComicInfo.Penciller: EJ Morges,Owen Gieni,E. J. Morges,E. J. Morges,Owen Gieni
ComicInfo.Summary: Avengelyne finds herself disoriented and trapped in the body of stripper and porn star Heaven Starr. Just as she is getting her bearings and remembering who and what she is, her old possessed body shows up to kill her.
ComicInfo.Title: Extreme Origins: Avengelyne; Devil in the Flesh Part 1
